tasks.label: web: typecheck and lint
tasks.command: pnpm -s -C web dlx turbo-ignore true >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm -C web -s run lint; else if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm --prefix web run lint; else yarn --cwd web run lint; fi; fi

tasks.label: web: build
tasks.command: if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm -C web -s run build; else if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm --prefix web run build; else yarn --cwd web run build; fi; fi

tasks.label: web: build (logo swap)
tasks.command: if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm -C web -s run build; else if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then npm --prefix web run build; else yarn --cwd web run build; fi; fi
